a.title: Go to West Mifflin Area School District

Go to West Mifflin Area High School

div.div: The mission of West Mifflin Area School District – in partnership with families and community – is to establish a challenging and safe learning environment, where all students will attain the quality education and life experiences to become responsible life-long learners and contributing members of an ever-changing global society.

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.a: April 23rd School Board Meeting Zoom Instructions.pdf

span.br: KINDERGARTEN REGISTRATION SURVEY UNDER PARENTS / STUDENT REGISTRATION INFORMATION
School Board Meeting Video March 26th via Zoom

p.span: Each student has 10 daily lessons in his or her flexible instruction packet. Our expectation is for your child to complete one lesson each day. Your classroom teacher will be reaching out to assist you with any instructional needs and to provide contact information. If the quarantine continues beyond the initial 10 days, we will send home more material and resources.

District families, we are here for any needs that you may have during this extraordinary time in education. Please do not hesitate to contact your child’s teacher, building principal, or counselor if you have any questions or concerns.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 112, 192); font-family: "Times New Roman",serif; font-size: 12pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);

p.span:
ALL SCHOOLS ARE CLOSED TO STUDENTS AND ALL ACTIVITIES ARE CANCELLED FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE ACADEMIC YEAR
West Mifflin Area School District Continuity of Education Plan Submission.pdf
West Mifflin Elementary Schools Grades K-5 Continuity of Education Plan Submission.pdf
West Mifflin Area Middle School Grades 6-8 Continuity of Education Plan Submission.pdf
West Mifflin Area High School Grades 9 -12 Continuity of Education Plan Submission.pdf

WMASD families, here is a sampling of various educational resources that can be used to enrich your child while we are shutdown. Feel free to use throughout each day. All are currently free during the shutdown.
